metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27379 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x, allowing x86 Intel HVM guestOS users to achieve unintended read/write DMA access, and possibly cause adenial of service (host OS crash) or gain privileges. This occurs because abackport missed a flush, and thus IOMMU updates were not always correct.NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-15565.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
